title: Elon Musk said he rebuffed Jeffrey Epstein. The emails tell a different story...
summary_full: Between late 2012 and the end of 2013, Musk and Epstein exchanged multiple emails discussing island visits, parties, schedules, and logistics. Some plans fell through. Others were cancelled. But the emails show Musk actively engaging in conversations about going.
